Introducing 'Hide Me' â€“ an innovative browser extension designed to protect your privacy. This unique tool is designed to protect your online interactions, automatically blurring your Facebook feed when someone is behind you, thereby protecting your personal information from prying eyes. With 'Hide Me,' the extension focuses on user-friendly features and activates seamlessly, providing a discreet layer of protection without affecting your browsing experience. Now you can engage on social media without worrying about your audience and make sure your online world remains private. You can scroll freely through your Facebook feed without worry because by hiding Facebook Eyes, you control who sees your screen and add an extra layer of security to your digital presence.
